Row.Text: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Space Procurements[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Allows the purchase of Spaceship parts with [ICON_GOLD] Gold. Recycling Centers increase a City's [ICON_RESEARCH] Science output by 25%.
